name: Senzu Beans
description: Mystical beans that replensish your energy

name: Magic Juice
description: Delicious drink that replenishes you to full health

name: King's Sword
description: Long, Sharp Blade originally wielded by the King

name: Majestic Bow and Arrow
description: Curved wooden bow and a feather arrow with a sharp point

name: Steel bunker
description: A steel hut that is impact resitant and will hide and protect you for 30 seconds

name: Dragon Skin Body Amour
description: Body suit armour made from the skin of a slayed dragon

name: Stun Rifle
description: Rifle that was brought from the future that launches electric shocked bullet projectiles
